```{r setup, include=FALSE, tidy=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment = NA, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE,
                      options(digits = 3, scipen = 999))
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(janitor)
library(broom)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)
library(car)
library(moderndive)
library(lm.beta)
```

```{r data}
height_wages <- read_csv("heightwage_british_all_multivariate.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(sex = factor(female, labels = c("male", "female")))
```

### (a)

```{r part_a}
height_wages %$% 
  lm(gwage33 ~ height16 + momed + daded + siblings) %>% 
  lm.beta()
```

### (b)

```{r part_b}
height_wages %$% 
  lm(gwage33 ~ sex) %>% 
  tidy()

height_wages %>% 
  mutate(sex = factor(1 - female, labels = c("male", "female"))) %$% 
  lm(gwage33 ~ sex) %>% 
  tidy()
```

### (c)

```{r part_c}
height_wages %$% 
  lm(log(gwage33) ~ sex) %>% 
  tidy()
```

### (d)

```{r part_d}
height_wages %$% 
  lm(log(gwage33) ~ sex + height33 + height16) %>% 
  tidy()
```

### (e)

```{r part_e}
height_wages %$% 
  lm(log(gwage33) ~ sex*height16 + siblings) %>% 
  tidy()

height_wages %$% 
  lm(log(gwage33) ~ sex*height16) %>% 
  linearHypothesis("height16 - sexfemale:height16 = 0")

```
